---

_Nevercold_, sometimes mistakenly referred to as nevercoal, is the charcoal left after wildfires in the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10). True to its name, _nevercold_ remains warm to the touch. If you use _nevercold_ to cast [_fire shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), the spell's duration increases by 1 minute, the cold resistance you gain from it lasts 1 hour, and you're protected from the effects of [severe cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) for 8 hours.
